short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sup Dropshipping Chrome extension help you sourcing the best price product from Chinese Wholesale websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features of SupDropshipping Extension.

1. Post Sourcing request from main e-commerce platforms like Amz, Shop, Temu etc.
2. Find better price for a specific product.

Core Features of Sup Dropshipping:

1.Regular updates of latest hot selling products
On Sup’s mall, you will see the latest hot selling items, giving you more options and insights to choose products for your stores.

2.Post sourcing request freely
For all products you want, you can post sourcing request freely, and Sup will help source the best-match products for you, either your store existing products or any other individual products.

3.Search products with product image
One of the most special service on Sup is Search by Image Service. It will enable you to search products on Chinese wholesale websites like 1688 simply by uploading a product image. Instead of Chinese, you’ll get a complete listing in English, which you could edit and import to your Shopify stores with just a few clicks.

4.Fulfill orders automatically
Sup helps automatically sync, manage and ship your shopify orders. Sup also automatically updates order status back to Shopify, and your customers could check order status directly. More efficient and less complicated.

5.Global warehousing
Sup owns global warehousing in the US, UK, China and other countries, making it closer to your customers.

6.Multiple choice on shipping methods
Sup offers a wide range of shipping methods, giving you more choices on shipment based on your budget. Sup also offers a useful shipping calculator, helping you to sort out the most economic shipment before you place orders.

7.Pro Service improves your customer experience on Sup
Sup helps customize your brand and enhance your customer loyalty with Sup’s special pro services. You can customize your own packaging. POD service helps easily personalize your products with low MOQ and affordable cost. Professional photography helps improve your product image on your own page. And more are coming.
